file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1

info:
  title: GMakers-Server API 명세서
  description: GMakers-Server API 명세서
  contact:
    name: JiHun & SungJun
    email: znftm93@gmail.com
  version: 1.0.0

servers:
  - url: http://localhost:8080/api
    description: local
  - url: http://52.79.197.237:8080/api
    description: prod

tags:
  - name: Account
    description: Account resource

paths:
  ### ChampionInfo ###
  /champion-info:
    get:
      summary: 챔피언 이름과 id값 목록
      tags:
        - ChampionInfo
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 성공

  ### Account ###
  /accounts/sign-up:
    post:
      summary: 회원가입
      tags:
        - Account
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          "application/json":
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SignUpRequest'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: 회원가입 성공
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
                writeOnly: true
                example: signUp success
        '400':
          description: 회원가입 실패
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExceptionResponse'

  /accounts/sign-in:
    post:
      summary: 로그인
      tags:
        - Account
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          "application/json":
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SignInRequest'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 로그인 성공
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SignInResponse'
        '400':
          description: 로그인 실패
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExceptionResponse'

  ### Profile ###
  /profiles:
    post:
      summary: 프로필 생성
      tags:
        - Profile
      requestBody:
        description: summonerName = LoL 소환사명
        required: true
        content:
          "application/json":
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProfileCreateRequest'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 프로필 생성 성공
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
                writeOnly: true
                example: create profile
        '400':
          description: 프로필 생성 실패
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExceptionResponse'

    get:
      summary: 프로필 메인 정보 조회 (메인화면의 내 카드 목록 프로필 데이터들, queryParam X), 프로필 검색 (인증된 프로필만 검색 가능, 즉 인증된 타 유저의 프로필을 보기 위한 검색, queryParam O)
      tags:
        - Profile
      operationId: profiles
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: summonerName
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: Hide on bush
          description: 롤 소환사 닉네임

      responses:
        '200':
          description: 조회 성공
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProfileFindResponses'

  /profiles/auth:
    patch:
      summary: 프로필 인증
      tags:
        - Profile
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          "application/json":
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProfileAuthRequest'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 랜덤 프로필 아이콘 아이디 값
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProfileAuthResponse'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/401'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/403'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/404'
        '500':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/500'

  /profiles/auth-confirm:
    patch:
      summary: 프로필 인증 확인
      tags:
        - Profile
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          "application/json":
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProfileAuthRequest'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 인증 성공
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProfileAuthConfirmResponse'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/401'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/403'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/404'
        '500':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/500'

  /summoner:
    get:
      summary: 프로필 검색 (모든 프로필 검색 가능)
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: summonerName
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: 롤 소환사 닉네임
      tags:
        - Profile
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 조회 성공
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SummonerFindResponse'


  /profiles/{profileId}:
    get:
      summary: 프로필 상세정보 조회
      tags:
        - Profile
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: profileId
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 조회 성공
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProfileDetailFindResponse'

    patch:
      summary: 프로필 수정
      tags:
        - Profile
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: profileId
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
          description: 사용자 계정(Account) id값
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          "application/json":
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProfileCreateRequest'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 수정 성공

    delete:
      summary: 프로필 삭제
      tags:
        - Profile
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: profileId
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
          description: 사용자 계정(Account) id값
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 삭제 성공
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
                writeOnly: true
                example: Delete Profile

components:
  schemas:
    ### Exception ###
    ExceptionDetailResponse:
      type: object
      readOnly: true
      properties:
        field:
          type: string
        value:
          type: string
        reason:
          type: string
    ExceptionResponse:
      type: object
      readOnly: true
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
        errors:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExceptionDetailResponse'

    ### Account ###
    SignUpRequest:
      type: object
      writeOnly: true
      properties:
        username:
          type: string
          maxLength: 20
          minLength: 4
          pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9]{4,20}$
          example: opgg
          nullable: false
        password:
          type: string
          maxLength: 20
          minLength: 8
          pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9]{8,20}$
          example: opggmobile!
          nullable: false

    SignInRequest:
      type: object
      writeOnly: true
      properties:
        username:
          type: string
          maxLength: 20
          minLength: 4
          pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9]{4,20}$
          example: opgg
          nullable: false
        password:
          type: string
          maxLength: 20
          minLength: 8
          pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9]{8,20}$
          example: opggmobile!
          nullable: false

    SignInResponse:
      type: object
      writeOnly: true
      properties:
        token:
          type: string
          example: eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJvnGdnIiwic3ViIjoiMSIsImV4cCI6MTYyODQzMTMwNCwiaWF0IjoxNjI4NDI5NTA0LCJhdXRoIjoiUk9MRV9VU0VSIn0.qRWiKpHKBF13M7Tw485NaDPveVF2iRh9vZ39YRJvItW16ikg7pHmmP3QwEzc732TPntruhgWzny-VrOBBk8LWA

    ### Summoner ###
    SummonerFindResponse:
      type: object
      writeOnly: true
      properties:
        level:
          type: integer
          example: 492
        profileIconId:
          type: integer
          example: 6
        summonerId:
          type: string
          example: c4ef16ITFOMN9FGfdphixlp8-vSDIOUgsadQqXz2zO9KMO9XqzzHs9_EQ2
        summonerName:
          type: string
          example: Hide on bush
        leaguePoint:
          type: string
          example: 600
        tier:
          type: string
          example: GRANDMASTER
        tierLevel:
          type: string
          example: I
        queue:
          type: string
          example: RANKED_SOLO

    ### Profile ###
    ProfileCreateRequest:
      type: object
      writeOnly: true
      properties:
        summonerName:
          type: string
          example: Hide on bush
          nullable: false
        description:
          type: string
          example: 저는 망나니 입니다. 칼챔을 좋아하며 스플릿 위주입니다
          nullable: false
        preferKeywords:
          type: array
          items:
            example: HEADSMAN, SPLIT
          nullable: true
        preferChampions:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              priority:
                type: integer
              championId:
                type: integer
          example:
            - priority: 1
              championId: 10
              nullable: false
            - priority: 2
              championId: 13
              nullable: true
            - priority: 3
              championId: 14
              nullable: true
          nullable: false
        preferLines:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              priority:
                type: integer
              line:
                type: string
          example:
            - priority: 1
              line: TOP
              nullable: false
            - priority: 2
              line: MID
              nullable: false
          nullable: false
        preferQueue:
          type: string
          example: RANKED_SOLO
          nullable: false

    ProfileAuthRequest:
      type: object
      writeOnly: true
      properties:
        summonerId:
          type: string
          example: c4ef16ITFOMN9FGfdphixlp8-vSDIOUgsadQqXz2zO9KMO9XqzzHs9_EQ2
          nullable: false

    ProfileAuthResponse:
      type: object
      writeOnly: true
      properties:
        iconId:
          type: string
          example: 5

    ProfileAuthConfirmResponse:
      type: object
      writeOnly: true
      properties:
        certified:
          type: boolean
          example: true

    ProfileFindResponse:
      example:
        -  accountId: 1
           username: "opgg"
           profileId: 1
           isCertified: true
           summonerAccountId: goaYy7-6PSARK_IedxJj5x25fekzfx5FafhHSfdfcIimF
           profileIconId: 6
           summonerId: "YLhKPSfcrbAGV4_oiKMt6ZLlAC7dITdXxBUtxkStn9qH5GU"
           summonerName: Hide on bush
           preferQueue: RANKED_SOLO
           level: 544
           queue: RANKED_SOLO
           tier: CHALLEGER
           tierLevel: 3
           preferLines:
             - line: TOP
               preferLinePriority: 1
             - line: NID
               preferLinePriority: 2
           certified: true

    ProfileFindResponses:
      example:
        -  accountId: 1
           username: "opgg"
           profileId: 1
           isCertified: true
           summonerAccountId: goaYy7-6PSARK_IedxJj5x25fekzfx5FafhHSfdfcIimF
           profileIconId: 6
           summonerId: "YLhKPSfcrbAGV4_oiKMt6ZLlAC7dITdXxBUtxkStn9qH5GU"
           summonerName: Hide on bush
           preferQueue: RANKED_SOLO
           level: 544
           queue: RANKED_SOLO
           tier: CHALLEGER
           tierLevel: 3
           preferLines:
             - line: TOP
               preferLinePriority: 1
             - line: NID
               preferLinePriority: 2
           certified: true
        -  accountId: 1
           username: "opgg"
           profileId: 2
           isCertified: true
           summonerAccountId: gfds-vcjkkl22eIedxJj5x25fekzfx5FdsvjuizuisA
           profileIconId: 6
           summonerId: "YLcxosvsdGV4_oiKMt6ads2AC7dITdXxfdfStn9f2azU"
           summonerName: 괴물쥐
           preferQueue: RANKED_SOLO
           level: 651
           queue: RANKED_SOLO
           tier: DIAMOND
           tierLevel: 2
           preferLines:
             - line: AD
               preferLinePriority: 1
             - line: SUP
               preferLinePriority: 2
           certified: true

    ProfileDetailFindResponse:
      type: object
      writeOnly: true
      properties:
        accountId:
          type: integer
          example: 1
        username:
          type: string
          example: "opgg"
        profileId:
          type: integer
          example: 1
        summonerAccountId:
          type: integer
          example: goaYy7-6PSARK_IedxJj5x25fekzfx5FafhHSfdfcIimF
        preferQueue:
          type: string
          example: RANKED_SOLO
        profileIconId:
          type: integer
          example: 6
        summonerId:
          type: string
          example: YLhKPSfcrbAGV4_oiKMt6ZLlAC7dITdXxBUtxkStn9qH5GU
        summonerName:
          type: string
          example: Hide on bush
        level:
          type: integer
          example: 544
        queue:
          type: string
          example: RANKED_SOLO
        tier:
          type: string
          example: CHALLEGER
        tierLevel:
          type: integer
          example: 1
        leaguePoint:
          type: integer
          example: 84
        loseGames:
          type: integer
          example: 10
        winGames:
          type: integer
          example: 100
        winRate:
          type: integer
          example: 90
        discription:
          type: string
          example: "저는 탑유저입니다. 로밍다니는것을 좋아하며 즐겜유저입니다. ~~~~~"
        preferChampions:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
          example:
            - championName: "르블랑"
              championId: 22
              championPoints: "97"
              preferChampionPriority: 1
              championLevel: 5
            - championName: "아지르"
              championId: 25
              championPoints: "77"
              preferChampionPriority: 2
              championLevel: 5
            - championName: "라이즈"
              championId: 27
              championPoints: "197"
              preferChampionPriority: 3
              championLevel: 6
        preferLines:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
          example:
            - line: TOP
              preferLinePriority: 1
            - line: MID
              preferLinePriority: 2
        preferKeywords:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
          example:
            - keyword: HEADSMAN
            - keyword: SPLIT
        certified:
          example: true
    Queue:
      type: string
      enum: [RANKED_SOLO, RANKED_FLEX, NONE]
    Tier:
      type: string
      enum: [NONE, IRON, BRONZE, SILVER, GOLD, PLATINUM, DIAMOND, MASTER, GRANDMASTER, CHALLENGER]
    Line:
      type: string
      enum: [TOP, JUNGLE, MID, AD, SUP]
    TierLevel:
      type: string
      enum: [IV(4), III(3), II(2), I(1), NONE(0)]
    Keyword:
      type: string
      enum: [HEADSMAN("망나니"), SPLIT("스플릿"), TANKER("탱커"),
             GANKING("갱킹"), ORIENTED_OBJECT("오브젝트지향"),
             ROAMING("로밍"), ASSASSIN("암살자"),
             GROWTH_TYPE("성장형"),
             UTILITY_TYPE("유틸형"),
             BATTLE_NATION("전투민족"), ORIENTED_TOWARDS_FIGHTING("한타지향");]


  responses:
    '400':
      description: Bad Request
    '401':
      description: Unauthorized
    '403':
      description: Forbidden
    '404':
      description: Not Found
    '500':
      description: Internal Server Error
